subject: Ski Jumping
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Severin Freund soared 135 meters on his second jump to seal Germany’s victory in Klingenthal, Germany, in the opening event of the World Cup ski jumping season.
snippet: Severin Freund soared 135 meters on his second jump to seal Germany’s victory in Klingenthal, Germany, in the opening event of the World Cup ski jumping season.
